meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Ed McIntyre Mark Schmelz Jim Vercolen Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #2501.

td.p: Ed McIntyre, a part-time newspaper copy editor from Durham, North Carolina
Mark Schmelz, a physicist from West Point, New York
Jim Vercolen, a part-time teacher from Rochester, New York (whose 4-day cash winnings total $40,200)

tr.td: ANIMALS
ACTORS & ACTRESSES
EXOTIC FRUITS & VEGETABLES
AMERICAN HISTORY
EXPLOSIVES
EUROPEAN POTPOURRI
